rules_text: Boast – {1}{B}: Target player discards a card. [i](Activate only if this creature attacked this turn and only once each turn.)[/i]
flavor_text: [i]As he traveled through the deep, dark wood, he whispered to the shadows: first his hopes, then his frustrations, his fears. As he neared the edge of the forest, they asked, “Why not stay?”[/i]
